Wow that looks great! I'm not a professional either (modeling/game graphics) I only picked up modeling about a year ago. I've been working on a new engine FX, any suggestions?

For those who are into Bahamutod's mod, I'm building new ship hulls. It's a little something I've been working on for a while, now with proper buoyancy we can have proper ships. : D

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-21T09:58:56Z" title="02/21/2016 09:58  AM" data-short="8 yr">February 21, 2016</time> by Eskandare**

> > > Quote > > > Hi everyone, I put this on the back burner for the moment. It hasn't been forgotten, I'm waiting for 1.1 to be released and I'm redesigning the setup, again. I'm currently finishing Thermonuclear Turbines and planning out a ship mod > Hey, I saw this over in your "[WIP] The Cities of Kerbin (Hex Blocks)" thread and I was totally stoked to hear that you are finishing Thermonuclear Turbines. Are you planning to release Thermonuclear Turbines 1.0 before KSP 1.1? Would love to test it out either way ( got a Steam copy just for the pre-release ). Love this mod and I used to use this mod all the time until 1.05, then I was waiting for your update because your WIP pics looked so good. Thanks for making this. Sean

Nice of you to keep the *only* possibly good turboprops away from the public.

![icDAk.gif](http://i.imgur.com/icDAk.gif)

Oh, and making people who want this for 1.0.5 being forced to wait for 1.1, which, let's be honest, won't be coming out until early May at best.

I just have to make changes to the configs, hopefully. There was a couple of changes in 1.1 that may effect the release.

1. Bad news, KM\_gimbal will not be updated. Fortunately axial gimbal control is now stock, I just need to see about implementing it.  

2. The Hot Rockets Style exhaust FX used to require SmokeScreen. I'm not sure if it is required anymore but there is a possibility that the FX won't display without it. Module Manager and Firespitter have been updated. Edit: SmokeScreen got an update.

3. I have to change the hierarchy of the engine heating FX and the animation. Fortunately legacy animation is still supported at least seen for emissives but not sure for transform.
